text: Gladys Akpa (born 1 January 1986) is a Nigerian football defender. She played in the Nigeria women's national football team. She played for the 2010 African Women's Championship and 2012 African Women's Championship. She also played for the Sunshine Queens club. ==International== ;Nigeria *African Women's Championship Winner (2): 2010, 2016 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Gladys Akpa
